newsitem.title: UK: UK's Clarke and George to meet in Nottingham.
newsitem.headline: UK's Clarke and George to meet in Nottingham.

text.p: Britain's Chancellor of the Exchequer Kenneth Clarke will hold his regular, monthly monetary meeting with Bank of England Governor Eddie George in Nottingham, a Treasury official said on Wednesday.
"It will be held in Nottingham," the official said.
Clarke and George meet on Thursday from 1415 GMT. They usually meet in the Treasury building in London.
A Reuter poll of 21 London-based economists found not one expecting rates to rise this week although most forecast a tightening soon after the May 1 election.
Clarke's electoral constituency is in Nottingham.
